arts.sum: KATHRYN BATTE: The forward saw red in the 86th minute on Saturday after lashing out at Micky van de Ven and Pape Matar Sarr. Kudus was originally shown a yellow card.

arts.ttl: Hits and misses: Garnacho ignites Man Utd as Sarr changes game for Spurs
arts.sum: Dejan Kulusevski said after Tottenham's 4-1 win over West Ham that it was Pape Sarr's introduction at half time in place of James Maddison that changed the game for Spurs. At half-time, with Southampton having already scored twice against Leicester, no team in the Premier League had scored fewer goals than Manchester United.
